column1: あ、亜美ちゃん、真美ちゃん……！
column3: Oh, Ami, Mami, ......!
column5: A-Ami, Mami...!

column1:
亜美、真美。もうそのくらいで十分だ。
いや、十分って言うのも語弊があるが……
column3:
Ami, Mami, that's enough.
No, enough is not the right word. ......
column5:
Ami, Mami. That's enough for me now...
Well, I guess it's not quite accurate to say that...

column1:
そろそろ……
レッスンの時間では……
column3:
It's about time ......
In lesson time: ......
column5:
It's about time...
It's time for lessons...

column1:

いっちょがんばってくんねー！
column3:
Oh, really! For the "Final Round",
Good luck with that!
column5:
Oh, you're right! Do your best to
face 『Final selection committee』.

column1:

column3:
I'm so glad you're here,
Why don't the four of us go into the studio in cavalry style?
column5:
Kaori-oneechan, hop! Since we're all here anyways...
How about the four of us ride in a jousting style?

column1:
……歌織さん、凛世。
亜美と真美のことを頼みます
column3:
...... Utahori, Rinyo.
I'm asking you to take care of Ami and Mami.
column5:
...Kaori-san, Rinze.
Please take care of ami and mami.

column1: はい、それではレッスンに行ってきます
column3: Yes, I'm off to my lesson then.
column5: Okay, I'm off to my lessons.

column1: ……行ってまいります
column3: I'm off to ......
column5: ...I'll be going now.

column1:
（春香、なんだか嬉しそうだな……。
声をかけてみるか……）
column3:
(Haruka, you look kind of happy. ......
(You can try to reach out to him at ......)
column5:
(Haruka seems kinda happy...
Guess I'll try talking to her...)

column1:
お疲れ様、春香。
どうしたんだ、嬉しそうな顔をしているけど
column3:
Good job, Haruka.
What's wrong? You look so happy.
column5:
Good work, Haruka.
What's wrong? You look happy.

column1: お疲れさまです、プロデューサーさん♪
column3: Good work, producer... ♪
column5: Good work, producer.♪

column1:
昨日、帰り道で街のイルミネーションが
点灯する瞬間を見たんです！
column3:
Yesterday, on my way home, I saw the illumination of the city.
I saw the moment it was lit!
column5:
Yesterday, on the way home I
saw a street light turn up!

column1:
すごく幻想的な風景で、
お仕事の疲れもすっかり癒されちゃいました♪
column3:
It was a very fantastic landscape,
I am now completely healed from the fatigue of work.
column5:
It was a fantastical scene,
and I'm so tired from work.♪

column1: 確かに、今の季節ならではの風景だな
column3: Indeed, it's a scene unique to this season.
column5: It's certainly a seasonal sight.

column1:
イルミネーションかあ。この時期、
街路樹がキラキラに光ってエモいよね★
column3:
Illumination, this time of year,
The street trees are shiny and sparkly and emo.
column5:
Illumination, huh? It's nice to see the trees
on a street glowing at this time of year.★

column1:
イルミネーションの……お星さま……
ルミナスのロゴに……似てる、かも
column3:
Illuminated ...... stars ......
Looks like ...... in the Luminous logo, maybe.
column5:
Illumination's star...
It's similar... to the Luminous logo.

column1:
言われてみるとそうですね。
この季節は、ルミナスの名前にぴったりです♪
column3:
That's what I've been told.
This season is perfect for the name Luminous♪
column5:
Now that you mention it, yes.
This is the perfect season for Luminous' name.♪

column1:
ルミナスって『輝き』って意味だもんね。
今のアタシたちも最高に輝いてる感じだし★
column3:
Luminous means 'shine,' right?
We're shining right now.
column5:
Luminous means 『Radiance』, right?
We feel like we're shining the brightest right now, too.★

column1:
うん、そうだね。
この調子で『スターリットドーム』に行こう♪
column3:
Yeah, I guess so.
Keep it up and let's go to the "Starlit Dome"...
column5:
Yeah, you're right.
Let's keep going to 『Starlit Dome』.♪

column1:
『スターリットドーム』……。
なんだか、全てがあっという間でしたね
column3:
"Starlit Dome," .......
It all kind of happened so fast.
column5:
『Starlit Dome』...
It all happened so fast.

column1:
うん……。
でも……いろんなことあった……
column3:
Yeah. .......
But ...... a lot of things happened ......
column5:
Okay...
But... so much has happened.

column1: ええ、本当に……
column3: Yes, really ......
column5: Yes, really...

column1:
美嘉さんが
一番印象に残っている出来事って、なんですか？
column3:
Mika.
What was the most memorable event?
column5:
What's the most memorable
thing about Mika-san?

column1:
やっぱ、みんなと一緒に自分たちの歌で
ステージに立った５月の『単独ライブ』かなっ
column3:
I knew we could do it with our own song with everyone else.
I think it was the "solo live show" in May when I took the stage.
column5:
I think it's 『Single performance』 from
May, when we all stood on stage singing together.

column1:
５月のステージ……半年も前のことなのに、
まだライブの興奮を覚えてるよ
column3:
The May stage ...... was less than six months ago,
I still remember the excitement of the gig.
column5:
The concert in May... It's been half a year,
but I can still feel the excitement from it.

column1:
みなさんと開いたお月見パーティーも、
私にはこの間の出来事のように思えます
column3:
I also had an otsukimi party that I held with everyone,
Seems like the last time this happened to me.
column5:
The moon-viewing party I had with you all seemed
like something that happened the other day.

column1:
『スターリットドーム』にみなさんと行きたい。
その願いが叶って幸せです……
column3:
I would like to go to "Starlit Dome" with you all.
I'm happy to see that wish come true: ......
column5:
I wanna go to 『Starlit Dome』 with everyone.
I'm happy that my wish came true...

column1:
甜花は……えっと……
ライブもレッスンも……思い出だけど……
column3:
Beet Hana is ...... eh ......
Both live shows and lessons are ...... memories, but ......
column5:
As for the Tenka... Ummm.
The concert, the lessons... It's all just a memory.

column1:
みんなと一緒にいる、時間……
それが、甜花にとって……大切な思い出……
column3:
I'm with you all, time ......
That's what makes ...... precious memories ...... for the beetroot.
column5:
The time I spent with everyone...
That's... a precious memory for Tenka.

column1: うん。甜花ちゃんの気持ち、よく分かるな
column3: Yes, I know exactly how you feel, Tetuka.
column5: Yeah. I can totally understand how you feel, Tenka-chan

column1:
なんとなく過ごした時間が、
一番の思い出になったりするんだよね
column3:
The time spent somehow,
Sometimes it's the most memorable.
column5:
Somehow, the time we spent together
became our best memories.

column1:
そうだね。ちょっとした失敗だったり、
何気なくかけてもらった言葉に喜んだり……
column3:
Yes, it's just a little mistake or something,
I am pleased by the words that are casually spoken to me and ......
column5:
That's right. Sometimes it was just a little mistake, and
other times I felt happy when he said something so casual...

column1:
って、なんだかしんみりしちゃったね。
最後のステージはこれからだっていうのに
column3:
I'm kind of sad about that, aren't I?
The last stage is just beginning.
column5:
Wow, that's pretty solemn.
The final stage is just beginning.

column1:
そうですね。
まだ『クリスタルウィンター』が控えていますから！
column3: We still have "Crystal Winter" coming up!
column5:
That's true.
『Crystal Winter』's still waiting!

column1: まだまだ……やることは、たくさん……！
column3: There is still ...... much ...... to do!
column5: There's still... so much left to do!

column1:
そうだね。年末にかけて、レッスンは
どんどん厳しくなりそうだし……
column3:
Yes, toward the end of the year, lessons will be
And it's going to get tougher and tougher. ......
column5:
That's right. It looks like lessons are going to
get harder and tougher by the end of this year...

column1:
今年はクリスマスのお祝いができそうにないけど、

column3:
I don't think I'll be able to celebrate Christmas this year, though,
We have to do what we have to do.
column5:
I don't think we can celebrate Christmas this year,
but there are things that need to be done.★

column1:
『クリスタルウィンター』まで、
あと２週間かあ……
column3:
To "Crystal Winter",
Two weeks to go... ......
column5:
There's only two weeks left
until 『Crystal Winter』...

column1:
きっと、あっという間に
過ぎちゃうんだろうけど……みんなで頑張ろうね！
column3:
I'm sure it will happen in no time.
I know it's going to pass. ...... Let's all do our best!
column5:
I'm sure it will all pass in the blink
of an eye, but... Let us do our best!

column1: （みんな、いい仲間に恵まれたな……！）
column3: (Hey guys, you're in good company ......!)
column5: (We're all blessed with good friends!)
